price: He added, “Do You see this one whom You have honored above me? If you give me respite until the Day of Resurrection, I will surely overpower his offspring, except for a few[57].”
arabic: قَالَ أَرَءَيۡتَكَ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كَرَّمۡتَ عَلَيَّ لَئِنۡ أَخَّرۡتَنِ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَأَحۡتَنِكَنَّ ذُرِّيَّتَهُۥٓ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
footnotes: [57] i.e., tempt and lead them astray.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: qāla ara-aytaka hādhā alladhī karramta ʿalayya la-in akhartani ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati la-aḥtanikanna dhurriyyatahu illā qalīlan
